title: Creating Preemptive Suspects: National Security, Border Defense, and Immigration Policy, 1980-Present
description: In this episode of the Latin American Perspectives podcast series Alex Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives Inc., is joined by Lynn Stephens, María L. Cruz-Torres and Seth M. Holmes, to discuss Stephen's article, "Creating Preemptive Suspects: National Security, Border Defense, and Immigration Policy, 1980-Present," and Cruz-Torres and Holmes's commentaries on the subject.
content:encoded: In this episode of the Latin American Perspectives podcast series Alex Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives Inc., is joined by Lynn Stephens, María L. Holmes, to discuss Stephen's article, "Creating Preemptive Suspects: National Security, Border Defense, and Immigration Policy, 1980-Present," and Cruz-Torres and Holmes's commentaries on the subject.
itunes:subtitle: November 2018 episode of the Latin American Perspectives podcast
